scripts.make-umd: rollup -c --environment ENV:prod -i src/flog.js -o dist/flog.umd.js -m -f umd -n flog
scripts.make-mjs: rollup -c --environment ENV:prod -i src/flog.js -o dist/flog.mjs -m -f es -n flog
scripts.make-cjs: rollup -c --environment ENV:prod -i src/flog.js -o dist/flog.js -m -f cjs -n flog
scripts.make-docs: rollup -c --environment ENV:prod -i src/flog.js -o docs/flog.umd.js -m -f umd -n flog
scripts.bundle: npm run make-umd && npm run make-cjs && npm run make-mjs && npm run make-docs
scripts.release: npm run bundle && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version
